page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE.....
page.content: When the bell goes for morning playtime we go onto the playground for fifteen minutes.After play we have reading time followed by maths until dinner time.Some children stay at school to eat sandwiches,others have school dinners,but I am one of those who go home.I go to my Grandad's. School usually starts at one o'clock, but I come for my swimming group at 12.45.After playtime we have singing together until the end of school,when I go home and wait for my Dad to come home from work.I watch television until my Mum gets in at 5.30 and then go out to play with my friends.At 8.30 I come back home for my supper and watch television until 9.30 and then I go to bed. Donna Bown(aged 12yrs.)
